query:
SELECT u.username
            FROM users u
            JOIN (
                SELECT
                    confirmed_at,
                    CASE
                        WHEN lesser_id = $1 THEN greater_id
                        ELSE lesser_id
                    END AS friend_id
                FROM friendship
                WHERE confirmed_at IS NOT NULL
                    AND (lesser_id = $1 OR greater_id = $1)
            ) AS f ON f.friend_id = u.id
            ORDER BY f.confirmed_at DESC
